rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever you attack, bless target creature. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, scry 1, then draw a card.”
